text: @Travisdhanraj @fordnation @Sflecce Now remember @fordnation was as despised a politician could be by at least half Ontario before COVID19. Teachers vicious strike, vulnerable tenants crushed as he lifted rent controls etc. With politics out of the way he has a completely different role.
